Application with different layouts, showcasing the differences in development and appearance.
João Montandon is moving to the DCC at UFMG. Let’s congratulate him and celebrate with him.
One of the Best Professors at COLTEC is Moving!

It is with joy and nostalgia that we announce the move of one of COLTEC’s most esteemed professors, João, to the Department of Computer Science (DCC) at UFMG. João revolutionized teaching with an engaging and practical approach, and his commitment to academic excellence has been crucial in shaping successful computing professionals. His classes were journeys of discovery and growth. Congratulations, João! Your journey reflects your commitment and passion for education. We look forward to seeing your new achievements at UFMG’s DCC and how your influence will continue to spread.
